title: Smart Data Models - ExcIEEEDC4B
description: Adapted from CIM data models. The class represents IEEE Std 421.5-2005 type DC4B model. These excitation systems utilize a field-controlled dc commutator exciter with a continuously acting voltage regulator having supplies obtained from the generator or auxiliary bus.  Reference: IEEE Standard 421.5-2005 Section 5.4.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be ExcIEEEDC4B

efd1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter voltage at which exciter saturation is defined (E).  Typical Value = 1.75. Default: 0.0

efd2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter voltage at which exciter saturation is defined (E).  Typical Value = 2.33. Default: 0.0

ka.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator gain (K).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

kd.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Regulator derivative gain (K).  Typical Value = 20. Default: 0.0

ke.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter constant related to self-excited field (K).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

kf.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Excitation control system stabilizer gain (K).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

ki.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Regulator integral gain (K).  Typical Value = 20. Default: 0.0

kp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Regulator proportional gain (K).  Typical Value = 20. Default: 0.0

oelin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. OEL input (OELin). true = LV gate false = subtract from error signal. Typical Value = true. Default: False

seefd1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter saturation function value at the corresponding exciter voltage, E (S[E]).  Typical Value = 0.08. Default: 0.0

seefd2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter saturation function value at the corresponding exciter voltage, E (S[E]).  Typical Value = 0.27. Default: 0.0

ta.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0.2. Default: 0

td.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Regulator derivative filter time constant(T).  Typical Value = 0.01. Default: 0

te.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter time constant, integration rate associated with exciter control (T).  Typical Value = 0.8. Default: 0

tf.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Excitation control system stabilizer time constant (T).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

uelin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. UEL input (UELin). true = HV gate false = add to error signal. Typical Value = true. Default: False

vemin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum exciter voltage output(V).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

vrmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = 2.7. Default: 0.0

vrmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = -0.9. Default: 0.0
